author: abdoulline
body:
#### PR description:

Addresses  github issue  https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/42960
Suggested by @jmmans 

#### PR validation:

(1)  Allows for the job to run without segfault in the setup conditions described in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/42960

(2) runTheMatrix.py -l limited --ibeos --useInput all   
     is all OK
title: HCAL unpacker: adding more protection against corrupted data
